name: HSDE
paper: Locality-based visual outlier detection algorithm for time series.
description: Hierarchy-segmentation-based outlier detection model for time series that aligns with the human visual systemâ€™s tendency to notice extreme values. In practice, the method first performs hierarchy segmentation by identifying extreme points, and then extract meaningful subsequences. Each extracted subsequence is assigned a local outlier factor score.
